alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Northern Kosciusko; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 9:36PM EST until December 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Northwest winds gusting to 25 to 30 mph diminishing overnight. * WHERE...Marshall, Northern Kosciusko and Western St. Joseph IN Counties. Greatest additional snow accumulation is expected across northern Kosciusko County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. While snow is expected to diminish by the Tuesday morning commute, roads may still be slick.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Marshall; Northern Kosciusko; Western St. Joseph
